name: Audio Drive Neon
description:
Audio Drive Neon is a game that lets you experience your favorite music in a completely new way! Driving fast will make you hold your breath and the visuals combined with your favorite song is going to give you the chills! You can play local song files (mp3, wav, xm, mod, s3m, it supported) and YouTube videos!

Steering wheel is recommended for more immersion, but you can also use the Vive Controllers.

Gameplay
The speed of your car is controlled by the intensity of the song. As the song is building up you can collect points, but then it's under your control to survive the Audio Drive!

Features:
  • Experience music in new ways!
  • Play any song through YouTube or your own files
  • Mesmerizing visuals will have your eyes wide open!
  • Driving fast in VR!
  • More content to come!
